itemDisplayName: Deploy custom configuration to Arc-enabled server.
description: Requires an existing Arc-enabled server. Deploys a custom configuration package that downloads and installs the .NET Core 6.0 Hosting Bundle. If the configuration of the machines drifts, you can re-apply the configuration by deploying the template again.
summary: This template deploys a configuration to an existing Arc-enabled server, to install the .NET Core 6.0 Hosting Bundle.
